backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access‑controlled user profiles, push notification subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request logging using Map/List storage and http outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required CSS background‑position updates and listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of frontend file summaries describing component behavior, hooks, styling, and PWA functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Debug notes documenting a frontend TypeScript build failure caused by Node.js typings in browser code.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, PWA configuration, Google Cast SDK loading, and a React mount timeout recovery UI.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme color, icons, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, activation cleanup, background asset prefetching, and push notification display.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide for running the frontend verification script to detect build‑breaking issues locally.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script verifying TypeScript config presence, NodeJS.Timeout usage, background asset paths, and service‑worker configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation, playback state, error boundaries, and lifecycle hooks for streaming and PWA behaviors.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button allowing users to start or stop casting the current stream and tracking cast events.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt logic handling platform detection, browser events, and guided installation flows for iOS and Android.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a bottom tab bar with Home, Shows, and Settings tabs, highlighting the active one.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact player with album art, scrolling title, artist, and a play/pause button, and opens the full player on tap.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Implements an accessible marquee text component with pause, focus, and reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Provides a volume slider tied to an audio element, syncing and updating its volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: UI panel for enabling and displaying push notification subscription status with error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form for submitting song or shoutout requests with validation and backend submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset the app when updates are available or service worker errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using the Web Share API with a fallback modal for copying the app link.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays a show card with image, title, description, genres, and schedule, triggering a click handler.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Renders a pulsating red LIVE badge with an icon for indicating live status.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Shows a small pulsing dot used to indicate on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a configurable track notification with icon, colors, title, artist, and an optional dismiss button.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides mock show data for display in the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbumArtBackground: Empty placeholder hook with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles auto‑resuming audio playback on visibility changes, focus events, and bfcache restores, notifying when manual resume is needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast availability, initialization, session handling, and casting state for a given stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Tracks and toggles a single favorite station flag persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Measures container and text widths to determine overflow and compute marquee animation properties.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Generates browser notifications for track, mix, or live metadata changes with deduplication and permission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles Push API subscription flow, permission requests, and storing subscription details via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching stream URLs with fallback logic, checking stream availability, fetching now‑playing metadata, and submitting user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, error tracking, and provides a reset mechanism for caches and storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown sleep timer that pauses an audio element when time expires.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles requesting and releasing the screen wake lock based on activity state, with visibility‑change re‑request logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, responsive background images, safe‑area utilities, and layout structure.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Renders a filterable list of shows with genre and day selectors, displaying ShowCards or a no‑results state.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Displays the main live radio screen with station branding, playback controls, and live status handling including loading and error states.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Shows detailed now‑playing info with album art, playback controls, volume, sleep timer, and sharing options.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Provides settings for notifications and background image cache refresh with UI cards and refresh handling.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Displays detailed information for a selected show with image, metadata, and actions like adding to calendar.
Captures early startup errors and conditionally shows a diagnostics overlay summarizing critical failures.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility for safely sending Google Analytics events, including playback and casting‑related tracking.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Builds and downloads a calendar (.ics) file for a show by computing its next occurrence and formatting timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes artwork URLs into valid HTTPS absolute URLs, handling relative and malformed inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, screens, animations, and theme settings with custom variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending feature requests for build state tracking.
